abstract.p: Nancy Ruscheninski, executive vice president and general manager at creative solutions division of Edelman Public Relations Worldwide, is named to new post of president of Edelman Interactive Solutions; Geoffrey A Dodge is named to new post of president and chief executive at Mediaspacebank.com (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * Nancy Ruscheinski, executive vice president and general manager at the creative solutions division of Edelman Public Relations Worldwide, Chicago, was named to the new post of president at Edelman Interactive Solutions, Chicago, which is being repositioned as a global operating unit. * Geoffrey A. Dodge was named to the new post of president and chief executive at Mediaspacebank.com, Norwalk, Conn. He had been publisher at Money magazine, New York, part of Time Inc.

Dodge was named to the new post of president and chief executive at Mediaspacebank.com, Norwalk, Conn. He had been publisher at Money magazine, New York, part of Time Inc.
